pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Common Rituals$() are those rituals that doesn't care about how you charged the rituals. Being a common ritual doesn't mean that the ritual is less powerfull.$(br2)Here are all the common rituals:

pages.title: Bewitched Ritual
pages.description: This ritual will grant you a $(item)Bewitched Shell.$()

pages.title: Lost Feathers Ritual
pages.description: Enchant your equipment with Feather Falling.

pages.title: Outpost Ritual
pages.description: Money corrupts people and so does this ritual with the Human pearl.

pages.title: Tipped Arrows
pages.description: Put easily your potions in your arrows.

pages.title: Indestructible Pearl Ritual
pages.description: This ritual will make of the empty pearl the hardest and cooler pearl ever.

pages.title: Proper Ascension Ritual
pages.description: This ritual improves the $(turtlemancy)Turtlemancer Wand$() into a $(turtlemancy)Advanced Turtlemancer Wand$().

pages.title: Improper Ascension Ritual
pages.description: This ritual improves the $(#d63031)Dark Turtlemancer Wand$() into a $(#d63031)Dark Advanced Turtlemancer Wand$().

pages.title: Repair Ritual
pages.description: This ritual repairs any damaged item in exchange of a lot of Bedrock.
